resources: Pool-Calculator Home Help About us Imprint Rectangle Circle This app calculates the required amount of water depending on the pool shape and the dimensions entered. The result is displayed in cubic meters. Enter dimensions Length in meters Radius in meters Width in meters Height in meters Function of the App: Choose your pool shape Welcome to Calculate pool water Rectangle Spherical Dimension input for rectangular pool Dimension input for spherical pool Your pool needs the following amount of water (in cbm): Height: Width: Length: Radius: Wateramount in cbm = Length * Width * Height Wateramount in cbm = π * r^2 * Height Rectangular pool Spherical pool Calculate Imprint of the HMNJ Software Solutions GmbH HMNJ Software Solutions GmbH Erna-Scheffler-Stra√üe 1A 51103 Cologne-Kalk Germany Represented by: Hendrik Jan Hinteman Marcel Maurice Schneider\ Nils Strehlau Jan-Hendrik Budde Sales tax identification number to section 27a of the sales tax act DE2934128056 Contact Phone: +49221 81843 Fax: +49221 81833 Email: support@hmnj.de Web: Google
